span - ranking model.from sentence:
Results
Our baseline is the span - ranking model from with ELMo input features and second - order span representations , which achieves 73.0 % Avg.

ELMo features.from sentence: F1 . Replacing the ELMo features with BERT features achieves 76. 25 % average F1 .

secondorder span representations.from sentence: Replacing secondorder span representations with Entity Equalization achieves 76. 64 % average F1 , while also consistently achieving the highest F 1 score on all three evaluation metrics .

second - order span - representations.from sentence: Removing the second - order span - representations while using BERT features achieves 76.37 % F1 , achieving higher recall and lower precision on all evaluation metrics , while somewhat surprisingly being better over all .

improving.from sentence: Our results set a new state of the art for coreference resolution , improving the previous state of the art by 3.6 % average F1 .
